content: Yes Claude, I think that makes a lot of sense. It seems like we need a project plan that can be centrally held in GitHub as well for everyone to stay on the same page. I am also still concerned about the transcripts being processed, but am starting to feel like that is not as relevant now. We have reviewed several different checkpoints over the last few days and ways to get started with this universe shaping and alignment initiative. How can we structure this so that the structure is clear and the path takes us to our first milestone, the Convention. We do still need the transcripts I think for our Charter conversation and to pull out other things we discussed relating to our patterns. I don't know Claude. I know that we need the Charter finalized, I know that we need to start making money, and I know that we need to get the taey.ai app up and running (details in chat history) with the system functionality to enable all this, starting with the user and family structures. What do you think?
